Test Name: Bacterial Typing by Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS)
Purpose: To generate accurate sequence-based bacterial profiles for epidemiological and clinical applications.
Container: Agar plate with appropriate growth media (Petri dish)
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, spectrophotometer/fluorometer, thermal cycler, high-throughput sequencer (e.g., Illumina MiSeq or NovaSeq), and bioinformatics workstation/software
